ca.weblite.codename1.db

Class DAO.Wrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.weblite.codename1.db.DAO.Wrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    Enclosing class:
    DAO<T>

    protected class DAO.Wrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    A wrapper class for the POJO model object. This stores a weak reference to the POJO object so that the GC can handle unloading the cache.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      protected DAO.Wrapper() 

    • Method Summary

      void update(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      Listens for updates to the POJO and marks dirty flags.
